data.title: William S. Burroughs, Nova Express, First US Hardback edition, Grove Press (1964) : Pleasures of Past Times
data.text:
First US Grove Press hardback edition. Condition of book is VG+ with slightly rubbed dust jacket and old price biro-ed on front endpaper. Endpapers slightly foxed.

To order: please click the enquiry button or email info@pleasuresofpasttimes.com and state your location and preferred payment method* I will respond within less than 24hours with a bespoke postage and packing quote (at near cost as possible).

*My preferred payment method is via online banking and I send a request based on your location. This is known as ACH in the USA (and is free to use â€“ unlike a wire). This means I can offer P&P at cost. Itâ€™s cheaper for you and cheaper for me ðŸ™‚

Alternatively, I can send a Paypal request. Please specify whether you wish to use your Debit or Credit card (no account necessary) â€“ or you wish to use your Paypal account. Paypal payments are subject to their fees (added), unless you wish to pay via the Family & Friends option.

Description

First US Grove Press hardback edition. Condition of book is VG+ with slightly rubbed dust jacket and old price biro-ed on front endpaper. Endpapers slightly foxed.

To order: please click the enquiry button or email info@pleasuresofpasttimes.com and state your location and preferred payment method* I will respond within less than 24hours with a bespoke postage and packing quote (at near cost as possible).

*My preferred payment method is via online banking and I send a request based on your location. This is known as ACH in the USA (and is free to use â€“ unlike a wire). This means I can offer P&P at cost. Itâ€™s cheaper for you and cheaper for me ðŸ™‚

Alternatively, I can send a Paypal request. Please specify whether you wish to use your Debit or Credit card (no account necessary) â€“ or you wish to use your Paypal account. Paypal payments are subject to their fees (added), unless you wish to pay via the Family & Friends option.
